body_html:
I had this problem, but was specifying my path as "/path/to/logs" -- once I swapped out "" for the absolute path to HOME, it worked fine.

One other thing that might be useful to others having this issue: It seems you must start tensorboard after the file has been created.
body_text:
I had this problem, but was specifying my path as "/path/to/logs" -- once I swapped out "" for the absolute path to HOME, it worked fine.
One other thing that might be useful to others having this issue: It seems you must start tensorboard after the file has been created.
body:
I had this problem, but was specifying my path as "~/path/to/logs" -- once I swapped out "~" for the absolute path to HOME, it worked fine.

One other thing that might be useful to others having this issue: It seems you must start tensorboard _after_ the file has been created.
